summary: Character study of a Doctor who saves a local criminal from a mob who are trying to hang him, but then tries to control the life of the young man, realizing that he can exploit his secret.
cast: Gary Cooper|Maria Schell|Karl Malden|George C. Scott|Karl Swenson|Virginia Gregg|John Dierkes|King Donovan|Ben Piazza|Emile Avery|Fern Barry|William 'Billy' Benedict|Oscar Blank|Danny Borzage|Annette Claudier|Tex Driscoll|Martin Eric|Frank Hagney|Dick Hudkins|John Hudkins|Jack Kenny|Dorothy Klewer|Baron James Lichter|Cactus Mack|Fred Marlow|Harold Millen|Kansas Moehring|Bob Morgan|Charles Morton|Karen Norris|Bud Osborne|Joe Phillips|Ford Raymond|Boyd Stockman|Clarence Straight|Slim Talbot|Don Turner|Sailor Vincent|Guy Wilkerson

title: El árbol del ahorcado
